news.content: Received Physics Department Honorary Scholarship from KAIST.
Received Best Project Award at Physics Winter Camp from KIAS.
Stockholm International Youth Science Seminar 2018: 'Dark Matter Axion Search Experiment using 18T HTS Magnet'. [Video](https://youtu.be/v3iwzfYi_VU?si=N9j8tsecrkxzVLII).
